turkish_example_sentence: Onlar modern bir ofis isteseler, şehrin merkezinde yer bulabiliriz.
english_example_sentence: If they were to want a modern office, we could find a place in the city center.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы они захотели современный офис, мы могли бы найти место в центре города.
